casebody.data:
Earl THOMPSON
v.
COMMISSIONER OF CORRECTION Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided May 17, 2017 Justine F. Miller, assigned counsel, in support of the petition. Bruce R. Lockwood, senior assistant state's attorney, in opposition.

The petitioner Earl Thompson's petition for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court, 172 Conn.App. 139 , 158 A.3d 814 (2017), is denied.
